innerText: Sabbavacanānamattho akkhareheva saññāyate. Akkharavipattiyaṃ hi atthassa dunnayathā hoti, tasmā akkharakosallaṃ bahūpakāraṃ suttantesu.
Te ca kho akkharā api akārādayo ekacattā līsa suttantesu sopakārā.

children: Taṃ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti akkharā nāma.

children: dantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
innerText: Tattha akkharesu akārādīsu odantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.

children: Taṃ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? A ā i ī u ū e o, iti sarā nāma.
Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti.

children: Taṃ yathā? A i u, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? A i u, iti rassā nāma.
Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.

children: Taṃ yathā? Ā ī ū e o, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? Ā ī ū e o, iti dīghā nāma.
Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā akkharā kakārādayo niggahitantā byañjanā nāma honti.

children: Taṃ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti byañjanā nāma.

children: kārādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā nāma honti.
innerText: Tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā nāma honti.

children: Taṃ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, iti
innerText: Taṃ yathā? Ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, iti vaggā nāma.
Yā ca pana paresu sakkataganthesu samaññā ghosāti vā aghosāti vā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.

children: ghosā nāma-ga gha ṅa, ja jha ña, ḍa ḍha ṇa, da dha na, ba bha ma, ya ra la va ha ḷa, iti
nāma. Aghosā nāma-ka kha, ca cha, ṭa ṭha, ta tha, pa pha, sa, iti
innerText: Tattha ghosā nāma-ga gha ṅa, ja jha ña, ḍa ḍha ṇa, da dha na, ba bha ma, ya ra la va ha ḷa, iti ghosā nāma. Aghosā nāma-ka kha, ca cha, ṭa ṭha, ta tha, pa pha, sa, iti aghosā nāma.
Tattha sandhiṃ kattukāmo pubbabyañjanaṃ adhoṭhitaṃ assaraṃ katvā sarañca upari katvā sarena viyojaye.
Assaraṃ kho byañjanaṃ adhoṭhataṃ parakkharaṃ naye yutte. Tatrābhiratimiccheyya.

children: tikasmā? Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me. Ettha pana yuttaṃ na hoti.
innerText: Yuttetikasmā? Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me. Ettha pana yuttaṃ na hoti.
Sarā kho sare pare lopaṃ papponti.
Yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni. No hetaṃ bhante sametāyasmā saṅghena.
Saramhā asarūpā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā.
Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnu’ māvasamaṇiyo. Vāti kasmā? Pañcindriyāni, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṃ pappoti.

children: ti kasmā? Yassindriyāni, tathūpamaṃ dhammavaraṃ adesayi.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Yassindriyāni, tathūpamaṃ dhammavaraṃ adesayi.
Saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci dīghaṃ pappoti. Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ.

children: ti kasmā? Pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgato. Natthaññaṃ kiñci.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgato. Natthaññaṃ kiñci.
Pubbo ca saro parasaralope kate kvaci dīghaṃ pappoti.

children: Kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā,
innerText: Kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā, kvacīti kasmā? Itissa muhuttampi.
Ekārassa antabhūtassa sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo, tyāhaṃ evaṃ vadeyyaṃ, tyāssa pahīnā honti.
Okārukārānaṃ antabhūtānaṃ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti.
Atha khvassa, svassa hoti, bahvābādho, vatthvettha vihitaṃ niccaṃ cakkhāpāthamāgacchati.

children: tikasmā? Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnumāva samaṇiyo.
innerText: Kvacītikasmā? Cattāro’me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnumāva samaṇiyo.
Sabbo icceso tisaddo byañjano sare pare kvaci cakāraṃ pappoti.
Iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, iccassa vacanīyaṃ, paccuttaritvā, paccāharati.
Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakārādeso hoti.
Vaggahaṇena dhakārassa hakārādeso hoti sāhu dassana mariyānaṃ.
Kho kassa, yathā? Nikkhamati. Iccevamādī yojetabbā.

children: kāraṃ pappoti navā. Paṭisunthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhūyate.
innerText: Pubbo ivaṇṇo sare pare yakāraṃ pappoti navā. Paṭisunthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhūyate.

children: ti kasmā? Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato, muttacāgī anuddhato.
innerText: Navāti kasmā? Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato, muttacāgī anuddhato.

children: kāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
innerText: Saramhā parassa evassa ekārassa ādissa rikāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
Yathariva vasudhātalañca sabbaṃ, tathariva guṇavā supūjaniyo.

children: ti kasmā? Yathā eva, tathā eva.
innerText: Navāti kasmā? Yathā eva, tathā eva.
Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpāni honti.
Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, pamādo maccuno padaṃ, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato ahu.
Sarā kho sare pare kvaci pakatirūpāni honti.
Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṃ papponti.

children: dhammaṃ vipassato, evaṃ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā.
innerText: Sammā dhammaṃ vipassato, evaṃ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā.

children: ti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati, patilīyati, paṭihaññati.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati, patilīyati, paṭihaññati.
Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṃ papponti.
Bhovādināma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.

children: ti kasmā? Sammāsamādhi, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ, upanīyati jīvitamappamāyu.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Sammāsamādhi, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ, upanīyati jīvitamappamāyu.
Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ papponti. Tatra ca lope kate akārāgamo hoti.
Sa sīlavā. Sa paññavā esa dhammo sanantano, sa ve kasāvamarahati, sa mānakāmopi bhaveyya, sa ve muni jātibhayaṃ adassi.

children: kasmā? So muni, eso dhammo padissati, na so kāsāvamarahati.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? So muni, eso dhammo padissati, na so kāsāvamarahati.
Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne.
Idhappamādo, purisassa jantuno, pabbajjaṃ kittayissāmi, cātuddasi, pañcaddasi, abhikkantataro cando.

children: ti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati.
innerText: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha modati pecca modati.
Vagge kho pubbesaṃ byañjanānaṃ ghosāghosabhūtānaṃ saramhā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tatiyapaṭhamakkharā dvebhāvaṃ gacchanti ṭhāne.
Eseva cajjhānapphalo, yatraṭṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya maccu, sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, cattāriṭṭhānāni naro pamatto.

children: ti kasmā? Idha cetaso daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti thāmasā.
innerText: Ṭhāneti kasmā? Idha cetaso daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti thāmasā.
Niggahitaṃ kho byañjane pare aṃ iti hoti.
Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahitaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappoti.
Tanniccutaṃ, dhammañcare sucaritaṃ, cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ. Santantassa manaṃ hoti, taṅkāruṇikaṃ, evaṅkho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
Vāti kasmā? Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu.
Ekārahakāre pare niggahitaṃ kho ñakāraṃ pappoti vā.
Paccattaññeva parinibbāyissāmi, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ. Tañhi tassa musā hoti.

children: kasmā? Evametaṃ abhiññāya, evaṃ hoti subhāsitaṃ.
innerText: Vāti kasmā? Evametaṃ abhiññāya, evaṃ hoti subhāsitaṃ.
Niggahitaṃ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṃ pappoti vā.
Niggahitassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.

children: ti kasmā? Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me.
innerText: Vāti kasmā? Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me.

children.innerText: Ya va ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā

innerText: 35, 34.Ya va ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
Sare pare yakāro vakāro makāro dakāro nakāro takāro rakāro lakāro ime āgamā honti vā.

children: Nayimassa vijjā, yathayidaṃ cittaṃ. Migī bhantā vudikkhati, sittā te lahu messati, asittā te garu messati. Asso

bhadro kasāmiva, sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ. Manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, attadatthamabhiññāya. Ciraṃnāyati, ito nāyati. Yasmātiha bhikkhave, tasmātiha bhikkhave, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ. Sabbhireva samāsetha, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āraggā. Chaḷabhiññā, saḷāyatanaṃ.
innerText: Nayimassa vijjā, yathayidaṃ cittaṃ. Migī bhantā vudikkhati, sittā te lahu messati, asittā te garu messati. Asso bhadro kasāmiva, sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ. Manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, attadatthamabhiññāya. Ciraṃnāyati, ito nāyati. Yasmātiha bhikkhave, tasmātiha bhikkhave, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ. Sabbhireva samāsetha, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āraggā. Chaḷabhiññā, saḷāyatanaṃ.

children: ti kasmā? Evaṃ mahiddhiyā esā, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me, ajeyyo anugāmiko.
innerText: Vāti kasmā? Evaṃ mahiddhiyā esā, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me, ajeyyo anugāmiko.
Caggahaṇena idheva makārassa pakāro hoti. Cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ.
Kakārassa ca dakāro hoti. Sadatthapasuto siyā.
Atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carituṃ. Parosahassaṃ.

children: kasmā? Etha passathimaṃ lokaṃ, andhībhūto ayaṃ loko.
innerText: Kvacīki kasmā? Etha passathimaṃ lokaṃ, andhībhūto ayaṃ loko.
Niggahitañcāgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci.
Cakkhuṃudapādi, avaṃsiro, yāvañcidha bhikkhave purimaṃ jātiṃ sarāmi, aṇuṃthūlāni sabbaso, manopubbaṅgamā dhammā.

children: ti kasmā? Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodati, na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodati, na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ.

children: visaddassa ca pakāro hoti. Pacessati, vicessati vā.
innerText: Caggahaṇena visaddassa ca pakāro hoti. Pacessati, vicessati vā.
Niggahitaṃ kho sare pare kvaci lopaṃ pappoti.

children: ti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo etamatthaṃ viditvāna.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo etamatthaṃ viditvāna.
Niggahitaṃ kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ pappoti.

children: ti kasmā? Etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Etaṃ maṅgalamuttamaṃ, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante.
Niggahitamhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā.
Vāti kasmā? Ahameva nūna bālo, etadahosi.
Niggahitamhā parasmiṃ sare lutte yadi byañjano sasaññogo visaññogo hoti.

children: tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānamantare ye sarūpā, tesampi lopo hoti. Agyāgāraṃ, paṭisanthāravutyassa.
innerText: Caggahaṇena tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānamantare ye sarūpā, tesampi lopo hoti. Agyāgāraṃ, paṭisanthāravutyassa.
Puthaiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti.

children: kārāgamo hoti, anto ca saro rasso hoti.
innerText: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti, anto ca saro rasso hoti.
Abhiiccetassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti. Abbhudīritaṃ, abbhuggacchati.
Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoitivuttarūpā naṃ honti vā.

children: saddassa ivaṇṇe pare ‘‘sabbo caṃ tī’’ti vuttarūpaṃ na hoti.
innerText: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare ‘‘sabbo caṃ tī’’ti vuttarūpaṃ na hoti.

children: iccetassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci
innerText: Patiiccetassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti.

children: kasmā? Paccantimesu janapadesu, patilīyati, patirūpadesavāso ca.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Paccantimesu janapadesu, patilīyati, patirūpadesavāso ca.
Puthaiccetassa anto saro byañjane pare ukāro hoti.
Antaggahaṇena aputhassāpi sare pare antassa ukāro hoti, manuññaṃ.
Avaiccetassa byañjane pare kvaci okāro hoti.

children: ti kasmā? Avasussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ.
innerText: Kvacīti kasmā? Avasussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ.
Anupadiṭṭhānaṃ upasagganipātānaṃ sarasandhīhi byañjanasandhīhi vuttasandhīhi ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

innerText: Pāpanaṃ , parāyaṇaṃ, upāyanaṃ, upāhanaṃ, nyāyogo, nigupadhi, anubodho, duvūpasantaṃ, suvūpasantaṃ, dvālayo, svālayo, durākhyātaṃ, svākhyāto, udīritaṃ, samuddiṭṭhaṃ, viyaggaṃ, vijjhaggaṃ, byaggaṃ, avayāgamanaṃ, anveti, anupaghāto, anacchariyaṃ, pariyesanā, parāmāso, evaṃ sare ca honti.

children: Pariggaho, paggaho, pakkamo, parakkamo, nikkamo, nikkasāvo, nillayanaṃ, dullayanaṃ, dumbhikkhaṃ, dubbuttaṃ, sandiṭṭhaṃ, duggaho, viggaho, niggato, abhikkamo, paṭikkamo, evaṃ
innerText: Pariggaho, paggaho, pakkamo, parakkamo, nikkamo, nikkasāvo, nillayanaṃ, dullayanaṃ, dumbhikkhaṃ, dubbuttaṃ, sandiṭṭhaṃ, duggaho, viggaho, niggato, abhikkamo, paṭikkamo, evaṃ byañjane ca. Sesā sabbe yojetabbā.
